Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖火台
Entry.EnglishText: Fire Dais

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖火台
Entry.EnglishText: Fire Dais

Entry.JapaneseText: このあたりだな。
Entry.EnglishText: This must be the place.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だろ、この台……？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you suppose this podium is for...?

Entry.JapaneseText: キミたちのおかげでずいぶん 良石が集まったよ。 当分は困らないね。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks to all of you, I've got my hands on a stash of good ore.. Won't be having any problems for the time being.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、私は自分の武器を グレードアップさせるが マイブームだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Right now, I'm hooked on upgrading weapons.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、なかなか強化するための よい石がなくてな。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I don't have good enough ore for the job.

Entry.JapaneseText: ひとつ、 分けてもらえないだろうか。
Entry.EnglishText: Would you happen to have any you could share with me?

Entry.JapaneseText: この前は石を 分けてもらってありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks for sharing that ore with me last time.

Entry.JapaneseText: また、なんかいい石を 分けてもらえるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Will you share your ore with me again some time?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>分けてあげますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Share one ore with him? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 何を分けてあげますか？ <unk18:48D00480><unk18:48D40480><unk18:48D80480><unk18:48DC0480><unk18:48E00480> 何もあげない
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>What will you share with him? <unk18:48D00480><unk18:48D40480><unk18:48D80480><unk18:48DC0480><unk18:48E00480> Nothing

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>あなたは斬錬石を 持っていません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You don't have any slash ore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>あなたは打錬石を 持っていません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You don't have any strike ore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>あなたは術錬石を 持っていません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You don't have any arts ore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>あなたは回錬石を 持っていません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You don't have any recovery ore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>あなたは醒錬石を 持っていません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You don't have any awakening ore.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 これでまたひとつ、 武器を強くできるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you. With this, I can strengthen a weapon once more.

Entry.JapaneseText: お礼に これをあげよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Take this, as this as a token of gratitude.

Entry.JapaneseText: いい石を見つけたら、 また持ってきておくれ。 お礼はできると思うからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you find some more of that good ore, bring it over here. I believe I can make it worth your while.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 これでまたひとつ、 武器を強くできるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you. With this, I can strengthen a weapon once more.

Entry.JapaneseText: お礼に これをあげよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Take this, as this as a token of gratitude.

Entry.JapaneseText: うーむ、そりゃ残念だ。 いい石がもらえたら、 お礼はするんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, that's too bad. If you get me some of that good ore, I'll make sure to pay you back...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖火台のようだな。 古代の人々は、ここで何かの 儀式を行っていたのかもしれん。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like a fire cauldron. Ancient civilizations may have conducted some sort of ritual here.

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、同じ儀式をやれば、 何かがわかるかもしれないネ。
Entry.EnglishText: In that case, we might learn something if we perform the same ritual.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……だが、どうすれば……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, but...how?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>聖壇<White>に書かれてた、 「強き心に強き翼を持て」って言葉に 何かありそうだと思いませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: Written on the <Cyan>Sacred Altar<White> was the phrase "a strong heart yields strong wings." Perhaps that might have something to do with it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 強き心、強き翼、か……
Entry.EnglishText: A strong heart and strong wings, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
